EmailTemplate.name: Exam fail notification - Geologist
EmailTemplate.subject: You didn’t pass the {!Education_History__c.Exam_Type__c} exam
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're sorry to tell you that you didn’t pass the {!Education_History__c.Exam_Type__c} exam you took on {!Education_History__c.Scheduled_Date__c}.
The required score was {!Education_History__c.Exam_Required_Score__c}.
Your score was {!Education_History__c.Score__c}.
You may retake the exam. Go to our Geologist examinations page to see next exam dates and deadlines.
Register for the exam through our new online system:
Go to {!Education_History__c.License_Portal_URL__c} Sign in or create an account and follow instructions.
To register for the exam by mail:
Fill out the Geologist and/or Specialty License Reexam Registration (pdf) form Print completed form Include payment for the exam fee Mail completed form and payment to the address on the form
Questions? Need help? {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP015
